Companion: Hey @. I was reading that going for nature walks is good for mental health. $q 775/776 shaneCompanion_followup#What do you say we take a stroll#$r 775 15 shaneCompanion_yes#Yeah, I've heard that bit about walks too. Where do you want to go?#$r 776 5 shaneCompanion_no#Sorry Shane, I'm a bit too tired to entertain company right now.#$r 776 0 shaneCompanion_no#Not today Shane. Sorry.
shaneCompanion_yes: I don't know. I was kind of hoping you had some ideas haha! Let's head out.$h
shaneCompanion_tired: I understand completely. Come say 'hi' if you ever want someone to chat with.
shaneCompanion_followup: $p 775 #Thanks for dragging me along with you, @.|I think I might head out on my own still...
CompanionActions: Hey @, what's up? #$q 500/501 CompanionFollowup#What's up?#$r 500 0 CompanionActionEnd#That's all the time I have to hang out today.#$r 501 0 CompanionActionContinue#Nothing, just taking a breather.
CompanionActionEnd: Alright, well thanks for hanging out with me today!$h
companionBeach: I've historically never been a fan of the beach, but I suppose I can see the appeal of sticking a lime in a beer and relaxing for a few hours.
companionSubmarine: Look @, this is amazing and all, but I *urp* think I'm gonna be *urp* sick.$10
companionDesert: I kind of have to admire Sandy a little bit. Choosing to set up shop in a place like this, it's a bold move.
companionClub: Oh man, this place does not look like somewhere I want to have too much fun in.$u
companionSkullCave: Come on @, is it really necessary to drag me along with you while you fight man-eating dragons?$a
companionSewer: Blech, this place smells like a late Saturday night.$s#$e#...And the Sunday morning after too for that matter...$s
companionMutantBugLand: You're telling me these things can LIVE in here?$10
companionArchaeologyHouse: Hmmmm. I never did much reading as a kid, or as an adult either.$u#$b#Maybe you could help me pick out a good book to read from here?
companionTunnel: What's in here you want to show me, @? Looks like nothing's in here to me.
companionWizardHouse: No way, this guy can use actual magic? Like in the movies?$h
companionWitchHut: I, uh. I can't help but feel for this poor woman. I feel like I've been in her place before, but with less access to evil magic.$s
companionAdventureGuild: It makes me happy to see guys like this pursuing what they love, even to this age. It gives me a little hope for myself and my own life.$l
companionMine: I'm not sure how much use I can be to you down here.#$b#I can try my best at morale support I guess.#$e#Go @! You can do it! Mine those rocks!$h
companionRailroad: Now this is what I'm talking about. It's so peaceful up here.$h#$e#I hardly ever can find the energy to get myself to explore, but I never regret it when I do.$6
companionBathHouse_Pool: I'm sorry. I'm not very comfortable taking my clothes off, even in front of people I know well.$s
companionWoods: I can't believe this place is so close to Marnie's, yet I've never been here until I came with you!$6
